WorkItem.Description:
To demonstrate working capability we need to calculate site values for all modules/properties in the decision tree.
A preferred way to generate values for the alpha version is to generate random numbers for each site.  See 1 Modify Design Tree Category and Property Names #23367 for an explanation of how to do this.
 
Probably the simplest way to accomplish this is to modify the dialog window that appears after a new site is defined to show the decision hierarchy and allow the user to type values for each leaf property.
 
Cost
   Land
      Area        ________  $
      Buffer      ________  $
      Easement ________ $
  Capital
      Bulidings     ________ $
      Perimeter    ________ $
      Equipment  _________ $
etc.
WorkItem.Summary: 2 Create summary property values for sites
